MealDescriptionEn: soya chunks cutlet recipe is a healthy nutritious snack that is richly flavoured with onion, ginger and other basic indian spices. It is a very popular for protein and can be taken as a simple snack item.
MealDescriptionFr: La recette de côtelettes de morceaux de soja est une collation nutritive saine qui est richement aromatisée avec de l'oignon, du gingembre et d'autres épices indiennes de base. C'est un très populaire pour les protéines et peut être pris comme un simple en-cas.
Method: soak the soya chunks into the hot water for 30 minutes. Drain the water and in a large bowl squeeze off excess water from the chunks properly
Tips: Keep batter for fermentation in a container that has enough room to raise. Add little water while grinding. Adjust water depending on required batter consistency. Dosa batter should be of pouring consistency. Make sure it's neither too thick nor too watery. Millets must be soaked for a minimum of 6 hrs to make the grains more digestible.
